Strings.Text:
{scroll 2}‟When operating the
transformer, be sure to{clear 0}set this power transmitter
to manual mode.”{clear 0}‟The old system is prone
to short circuiting.{clear 0}Be careful not to let it
exceed maximum levels.”{clear 0}Will you set this device
to manual mode?{branch 0}
{scroll 2}The meters seem to be\nout of order.

{scroll 2}There is a transformer
that supplies power to{clear 0} 
the facility.{clear 0}It seems to be set to
auto mode.
{scroll 2}‟High voltage control\nroom. The lock will be{clear 0} \nreleased at 115V-125V.”
‟Low voltage control room.\nThe lock will be released{clear 0} \nat 15V-25V.”
{scroll 2}An old emergency exit. The\nrusty knob won't turn.
{scroll 0}{branch 160}Head to the emergency exit.{live}Increase electricity output.{live}
